title: Home
content:
Beneath the sky so wide,
I found my voice again.
A whisper turned to echoes,
Carried by the wind.

title: Echoes in the Wind
content:
Whispers drift through the canyon of my heart,
Lingering like forgotten songs,
They speak of horizons yet unseen,
And dreams still unfolding.

title: Silent Shores
content:
The ocean holds its breath at dawn,
Waiting for the sun to rise.
Each wave a memory,
Each tide a promise kept.

title: My Cry
content:
They say the end of the world is nigh
And I want to go to heaven when I die
I lift my eyes to look up on high
And bid the world a quick bye
I search to behold his compassionate eye
But His face turns away with a sigh
Because the life I lived was a lie
